front.title: Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure - Algorithm Identifiers for FrodoKEM

abstract.t: FrodoKEM is an unstructured lattice-based Key Encapsulation Mechanism (KEM). Compared to ML-KEM, FrodoKEM is considered as having more conservative design. This document specifies the conventions for using FrodoKEM in X.509 Public Key Infrastructure. The conventions for the subject public keys and private keys are also specified.
